body:
Here is a list of things that need to be fixed or changed on the avicus network

  • Tagging: everytime i try it comes back as 500 Server Error tag=_MarshMello_PVP {}
  • DTM02: its always offline
  • chat filter: it dosent have to be that complicated, just a simple one will do
  • Lobby: its almost summer and its snowing on avicus. please
  • add more maps: everyone can agree that it gets boring playing the same rot for a long time. it would be cool to just add a TON of maps to make like a 50 map rot. it would also give other good builders a chance
  • Uploading files:why cant I upload just click "add file" instead of adding a link
  • maybe have a few sales now and then on the shop for ranks
  • /tip command: ever wanted to give some credits to a friend /tip (Player) Amount
  • change the register page: i always get a longass password that dosent even work
  • adding a live message board were players could chat within the website would be cool
  • Im outa ideas going to play hockey now comment down more  ideas below bye

  • Im outa ideas going to play hockey now comment down more  ideas below bye
title: Things that need to be fixed

replies.body:
+1 on most of em

  • Maybe if the rots were changed every 2nd weeks? And almost all maps should be given at least one chance even if theyre bad or not.
  • Changing rank names?? Just a random idea that sounds cool to el
replies.body_tagged:
+1 on most of em

  • Maybe if the rots were changed every 2nd weeks? And almost all maps should be given at least one chance even if theyre bad or not.
  • Changing rank names?? Just a random idea that sounds cool to el

replies.body: Big +1
replies.body_tagged: Big +1

replies.body:
adding a live message board were players could chat within the website would be cool

I Made a post talking about this and some people supported this but the answer for my post was '' A chat system will lag a lot the website '' so idk i hope devs could add this but i think the host its not that powefull
replies.body_tagged:
adding a live message board were players could chat within the website would be cool

I Made a post talking about this and some people supported this but the answer for my post was '' A chat system will lag a lot the website '' so idk i hope devs could add this but i think the host its not that powefull

replies.body:
+1

PLEASE do double credit weekends... It will increase the player count SO much.
Also, sales on the shop should be a more common thing
replies.body_tagged:
+1

PLEASE do double credit weekends... It will increase the player count SO much.
Also, sales on the shop should be a more common thing

replies.body:
Tagging: everytime i try it comes back as 500 Server Error tag=_MarshMello_PVP {}
You tag other using tag={playername}

DTM02: its always offline
On rare occasions, if destroy01 and mix are full this server will be activated so more games can be played at the same time

chat filter: it dosent have to be that complicated, just a simple one will do
It would be extremely easy to bypass it, not worth to develop it.

Lobby: its almost summer and its snowing on avicus. please
Up to the mapdev team, I'll get someone to update it.

add more maps: everyone can agree that it gets boring playing the same rot for a long time. it would be cool to just add a TON of maps to make like a 50 map rot. it would also give other good builders a chance
That would be amazing, but the map making scene dried out. It may be possible since there are many unanswered submissions.
 
Uploading files:why cant I upload just click "add file" instead of adding a link
Avicus is not a file hosting service, we don't actually own any servers, we just rent them. If we allow file uploading the server costs would explode because we would need a big storage capacity.

maybe have a few sales now and then on the shop for ranks
This is actually a good idea.

/tip command: ever wanted to give some credits to a friend /tip (Player) Amount
This could be implemented, I'm gonna ask the dev.

change the register page: i always get a longass password that dosent even work
You don't get a long password, you need to join a given server address and then you execute the given command, now you are registered.

adding a live message board were players could chat within the website would be cool
Another place moderators have to watch out for. It's easier to use skype or join the community slack/discord.
